Package imagingbook.pub.geometry.line

Class AlgebraicLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HessianLine
    public class AlgebraicLine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an algebraic line of the form A x + B y + C = 0. Instances are immutable and normalized such that ||(A,B)|| = 1.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance​(double x,
                          double y)
        Returns the perpendicular distance between this line and the point (x, y). The result may be positive or negative, depending on which side of the line (x, y) is located. It is assumed that the line is normalized, i.e., ||(a,b)|| = 1.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of point position.
        y - y-coordinate of point position.
        Returns:
        The perpendicular distance between this line and the point (x, y).

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance​(Pnt2d p)
        Returns the perpendicular distance between this line and the point p. The result may be positive or negative, depending on which side of the line p is located.
        Parameters:
        p - point position.
        Returns:
        The perpendicular distance between this line and the point p.

      • getClosestLinePoint

        public Pnt2d getClosestLinePoint​(Pnt2d p)
        Returns the point on the line that is closest to the specified 2D point. The line is assumed to be normalized.
        Parameters:
        p - an arbitrary 2D point
        Returns:
        the closest line point
